```{r}
library(MATSS)
library(drake)
library(LDATS)
```

## Plot LDAS

```{r plot LDA, echo = F}
lda_results <- readd(lda_results)

for (i in seq(lda_results))
{
    print(names(lda_results)[i])
    if (names(lda_results)[i] == "lda_portal_data")
    {
       plot(lda_results[[i]][1][[1]], 
             xtime = drake::readd(portal_data_raw)$censusdate,
             xname = 'Year')
        title(main = names(lda_results)[i])
    } else {
        plot(lda_results[[i]][1][[1]], xname = 'Time step')
        title(main = names(lda_results)[i])
    }
    
}
```
